title: Nigerian lady calls out Instagram fashion designer after taking delivery of...
content: A Twitter user simply identified as @loladesue has called out an Instagram Fashion designer identified as Teju Pretty, after taking delivery of the outfits she paid N60k to sew.    @loladesue who noted that the Instagram fashion designer was also rude, added that the fabric was also way too cheap.    Her tweets reads;    LMFAOOOOOOOOO this is what your fav Instagram fashion designer made for me for 60k I am so livid, I’m laughing. If you see a “tola_official__” on instagram, save yourself the time, energy and money. She’s hella rude too. Dead! What I ordered, what I got. For 30k each, 60k total. I want a refund, the fabric is so cheap too and she’s rude asf. “Tola_offical__” on instagram is a fraud.    I’m sticking to ASOS please, buy Nigerian to save the whatever that slogan is, my ass. It’s 60,000 Naira please, not dollars. Ugh! Yeah, the jargons she sewed is really the fault of my body size. Idiots.                          LMFAOOOOOOOOO this is what your fav Instagram fashion designer made for me for 60k I am so livid, I’m laughing. pic.twitter.com/BucjgbA0zp    — Sue (@loladesue) June 1, 2018      If you see a “tola_official__” on instagram, save yourself the time, energy and money. She’s hella rude too. Dead!    — Sue (@loladesue) June 1, 2018      What I ordered, what I got. For 30k each, 60k total.  I want a refund, the fabric is so cheap too and she’s rude asf. “Tola_offical__” on instagram is a fraud. pic.twitter.com/51SyLokMTt    — Sue (@loladesue) June 1, 2018     Comments comments
